title: Riolu

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Force Palm** - Neutralize one of your target's abilities at random for the next day and night.
**Swords Dance** - Your next usage of Force Palm will deal a Basic attack in addition to its normal effect.
**Vacuum Wave** - Deal a Basic attack. Bypasses all protective effects. (1 Use)
**Evolve** - Evolve into (2562) Lucario. You must have killed at least two people.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: **Inner Focus** - Roleblock and Prevention Immunity. Your abilities cannot be neutralized.

desc:
Post 2561
*Riolu radiates a powerful aura to let others know how it is feeling. It does not know how to control it, and most townies are uncomfortable feeling this aura.*
